item.title:
RT by @inpHilltr8r: Today is the anniversary of the Stonewall riots, the reason Pride is in June.
In 1969, it was illegal to wear clothes that were considered inappropriate for one's sex and when the police raided the Stonewall Inn's gay bar, they started to do a genital check (as was procedure).
item.dc:creator: @KristaLerista
item.description:
Today is the anniversary of the Stonewall riots, the reason Pride is in June.

In 1969, it was illegal to wear clothes that were considered inappropriate for one's sex and when the police raided the Stonewall Inn's gay bar, they started to do a genital check (as was procedure).

item.title:
RT by @inpHilltr8r: The point this woman thinks she's making about art, is literally the point of this piece.
But this piece does in fact suck because it's a stolen idea from Elsa von Freytag-Loringhoven*.
*h/t @xtina_catherine
item.dc:creator: @IfyNwadiwe

item.title:

item.title:
RT by @inpHilltr8r: One more thing, a basic break down of the math for those who are going to be exuberantly obtuse:
Reader: *pays amazon money*
Reader: *reads book*
Reader: *returns book*
Amazon: *keeps money and makes author pay it back instead*
THAT'S the issue here, folks.
item.dc:creator: @QEisenacher
item.description:
One more thing, a basic break down of the math for those who are going to be exuberantly obtuse:

Reader: *pays amazon money*

Reader: *reads book*

Reader: *returns book*

Amazon: *keeps money and makes author pay it back instead*

THAT'S the issue here, folks.

item.title:
RT by @inpHilltr8r: A netflix exec wakes up to find himself in a dark, dirty room, leg chained to a grimy pipe. Fluorescent lights buzz to life, blinding him.
Static. A deep voice booms out of a crackly speaker.
"Good morning and welcome to my immersive pitch for a new show."
item.dc:creator: @pookleblinky
item.description:
A netflix exec wakes up to find himself in a dark, dirty room, leg chained to a grimy pipe. Fluorescent lights buzz to life, blinding him.

Static. A deep voice booms out of a crackly speaker.

"Good morning and welcome to my immersive pitch for a new show."
